instruction: Analyze the historical performance of Latin American markets compared to other emerging market regions.
output: Latin American markets have shown higher resilience during periods of financial distress, as evidenced by their faster recovery from the global financial crisis and early stages of the COVID-19 pandemic. However, their performance has also been more volatile in absolute and relative terms, with a higher beta than other EM regions. The MSCI EM Latin America IMI has outperformed other EM regions during "up" markets, contributing to its overall performance over the last 20 years.
